body_html:
Zach and I agreed to expose a new concept from ATen, 'primitive' which expresses whether or not you can automatically differentiate the function or not. The updated patch now has this refactor.

I still haven't deduplicated the code generation codepath between primitive/non-primitive dispatch. Would like a second opinion on this matter.
body_text:
Zach and I agreed to expose a new concept from ATen, 'primitive' which expresses whether or not you can automatically differentiate the function or not.  The updated patch now has this refactor.
I still haven't deduplicated the code generation codepath between primitive/non-primitive dispatch. Would like a second opinion on this matter.
body:
Zach and I agreed to expose a new concept from ATen, 'primitive' which expresses whether or not you can automatically differentiate the function or not.  The updated patch now has this refactor.

I still haven't deduplicated the code generation codepath between primitive/non-primitive dispatch. Would like a second opinion on this matter.
